name: Knight
description: High defence and hitpoints make you a difficult target to bring down. Choose between swords, clubs, shields and two handed axes.

name: Ranger
description: Consistent ranged damage and good survivability makes you an excellent addition to any party. You are a master of the bow.

name: Mage
description: Low health but high ranged damage makes you a real glass cannon. Runes allow you to do massive bursts of damage. You wield the elements.

name: Shaman
description: Powerful support healing spells make you a great asset to any team. Runes allow you to deal sustained nature damage and heal allies.
